headline: Is Mizuho's Offshore Custody Deal Reshaping State Street’s Asset Growth Story (STT)?
summary: State Street Corporation recently completed the transfer of Mizuho Financial Group’s offshore custody and related businesses outside of Japan, adding approximately US$580 billion in assets under custody and US$24 billion in assets under administration. This move, alongside a 42.1% annualized dividend increase and solid earnings projections, highlights State Street's ongoing focus on expansion and capital return to shareholders. We'll assess how the acquisition of Mizuho’s offshore business...
